prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Drums, Guitar, Bass, Piano, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Brass, Drums, Guitar, Bass, and Piano, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Brass, Drums, Guitar, Bass, and Piano, omitting Pipe.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Brass, Drums, Guitar, Bass, Piano, yet no Pipe.
